sentences.en: And all the time next spring's elections are drawing closer.
sentences.cn: 明年春天的选举即将来临。

sentences.en: Good fortune will follow you, both in this world and the next.
sentences.cn: 无论今世还是来生，好运都会伴随你。

sentences.en: Grace sighed so heavily that Trish could hear it in the next room.
sentences.cn: 格雷丝沉重地叹气，特蕾什在隔壁房间都听到了。

sentences.en: he is &B{next in line to} the throne.
sentences.cn: 他是皇位的继承人。

sentences.en: He is unpredictable, weeping one moment, laughing the next.
sentences.cn: 他喜怒无常，一会儿哭，一会儿笑。

sentences.en: He was jailed in February 1992 and could be released next year.
sentences.cn: 他于1992年2月入狱，可能明年获释。

sentences.en: His course at Sheffield University will not recommence until next year.
sentences.cn: 他在谢菲尔德大学的课程要到明年才能继续。

sentences.en: I enjoy pleasure as much as the next person.
sentences.cn: 我和别人一样愉快。

sentences.en: I just missed my flight to Chicago. When’s the next one?
sentences.cn: 我刚错过去芝加哥的航班。下一班是几点钟？

sentences.en: I shall be 26 years old on Friday next.
sentences.cn: 下周五我就26岁了.

sentences.en: I'll be 26 years old next Friday.
sentences.cn: 我下周五就26岁了。

sentences.en: I've asked Mum to sit for us next Saturday.
sentences.cn: 我已经拜托妈妈下周六为我们临时照看一下孩子。

sentences.en: Let me just see what the next song is.
sentences.cn: 我来看看下一首歌是什么。

sentences.en: next to impossible.
sentences.cn: 几乎不可能

sentences.en: Next to skiing, she likes hiking.
sentences.cn: 除了滑雪，她最喜欢徒步旅行

sentences.en: Next, put it in the oven for 20 minutes.
sentences.cn: 然后把它放到烤箱里烤20分钟。

sentences.en: Over the next couple of months, try to relax more and get more exercise.
sentences.cn: 接下来的几个月里，要尽量多放松、多运动。

sentences.en: the car next to hers.
sentences.cn: 挨着她的车

sentences.en: The legislation is expected to be passed in the next parliament.
sentences.cn: 预计这项法案将在下一届议会中通过。

sentences.en: The man in the next chair was asleep.
sentences.cn: 邻座的男子睡着了。

sentences.en: The next few weeks will be a period of readjustment.
sentences.cn: 接下来的几周将是适应阶段。

sentences.en: The next six months will be the hardest.
sentences.cn: 接下来的六个月将是最难熬的。

sentences.en: The next stop on this cruise is likely to be in Cornwall.
sentences.cn: 此次航游的下一站很可能是在康沃尔。

sentences.en: The three parties will meet next month to work out remaining differences.
sentences.cn: 三方将在下个月会面，以解决余下的分歧。

sentences.en: They have a more than even chance of winning the next election.
sentences.cn: 他们赢得下届选举的机会在五成以上。

sentences.en: We’ll look at the proposals at the next meeting.
sentences.cn: 下一次会议我们要研究一下这些提议。

sentences.en: When I next saw her she completely ignored me.
sentences.cn: 我再次见到她时，她压根儿没有理我。

sentences.en: When we next met, he was much more jovial.
sentences.cn: 我们再次见面时，他愉快多了。

sentences.en: Why should it be put off till next month?
sentences.cn: 为什么非要挨到下个月不可？

sentences.en: With John here, you never know what will happen next.
sentences.cn: 有约翰在这里，你永远都不会知道接下来会发生什么事。

sentences.en: You have to consider what to do next.
sentences.cn: 你必须考虑下一步该做什么。

phrases.tran_cn: [美国俚语]博得某人欢心；(尤指在性关系上)与某人相契，熟识某人
（某些宗教信仰中的）阴间，地府
[用以表示惊讶或惊奇]下一步怎么样；还会有何等的荒唐事

trans.tran_en: Thenext place or person is the one that is nearest to you or that is the first one that you come to
the next person or thing in a list, series etc comes after the one that you are dealing with now
the next event, day, time etc is the one that happens after the present one, or the previous one
